Spell Effect: Inspire Courage (3 rounds).name: Spell Effect: Inspire Courage (3 rounds)
Spell Effect: Inspire Courage (3 rounds).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IAjvwqgiDr3qGYxY]{Inspire Courage}

You are inspired by words or tunes of encouragement. You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves against fear effects.

Spell Effect: Inspire Defense (3 rounds).name: Spell Effect: Inspire Defense (3 rounds)
Spell Effect: Inspire Defense (3 rounds).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.bH0kPuf7UKxRvi2P]{Inspire Defense}

You inspire your allies to protect themselves more effectively. You and all allies in the area gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws, as well as resistance equal to half the spell's level to physical damage.

Note: resistance is not automatically added.

Spell Effect: Inspire Defense (4 rounds).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.bH0kPuf7UKxRvi2P]{Inspire Defense}

You inspire your allies to protect themselves more effectively. You and all allies in the area gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws, as well as resistance equal to half the spell's level to physical damage.

Note: resistance is not automatically added.

Spell Effect: Song of Strength (3 rounds.name: Spell Effect: Song of Strength (3 rounds)
Spell Effect: Song of Strength (3 rounds.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Xxdwkt0EEDgP1LGc]{Song of Strength}

You bolster your allies' physical strength with a hearty exhortation. You and your allies gain a +1 status bonus to Athletics checks and to their DCs against Athletics skill actions such as Disarm, Shove, and Trip.

Note: bonus to DCs is not automatically added.

Note: bonus to DCs is not automatically added.
